title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL TORO BULLBAR – FORD EVEREST (2015-2022)

content.rendered:
OFFROAD ANIMAL TORO BULLBAR TO SUIT FORD EVEREST (2015-2022)

Offroad Animal Toro Bullbar to suit Ford Everest (2015+) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Benefits:

  • Full Protection for the front of your vehicle
  • Looks. Yep this bad boy looks great and will give your Everest that super-aggressive look
  • The smaller bar means less weight so your Everest can tow more and go farther
  • Much better airflow than the rest to help keep your engine cool
  • Easy fitment of bar and winch – winch can be fitted after bar is fitted
  • Winch mounts feet down, (actually how most winches were designed)
  • Can have LED light bar fit inside bar for super stealth cool look (up to 22″ LED single row)
  • Integrated recovery points as standard

 

Features:

  • ADR compliant
  • Airbag compatible
  • Bumper replacement, with no cutting of bumper.
  • Welded one piece bar with welded wing supports for super toughness
  • Only sits 150-160mm out from front of grill. Compare that to our standard 3 letter competitors
  • Zinc plated then powder coated Matte black
  • Hi lift jacking points included in design
  • Suits most low mount winches including Warn Zeon
  • Works with TECH PACK and forward parking sensors and cameras
  • Works with factory fog lights or easily mount a Cube light in each wing
  • Number plate flip included for those running a winch
  • Can be colour coded to vehicle
  • 16mm hi-tensile steel tow hooks as standard

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Ford Everest!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
